title: 820-3115-b charger stops working
message:
hi, got an 820-3115-b, works fine except that the charger shuts off after a while (light goes off and its not detected). Only happens with battery connected. I have to unplug and plug the charger again for it to start working again. 

Tried 3 different batteries, different charger and different DC in jack,

title: 820-3115-b charger stops working
message:
Test the machine disconnecting BIL.
The battery is charging properly?

title: 820-3115-b charger stops working
message:
The charger stops working even with everything disconnected. 

Yes, the battery usually chargers for about +1% then the charger shuts off.

title: 820-3115-b charger stops working
message:
Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.
Run EFI ASD with battery connected, if possible.

title: 820-3115-b charger stops working
message:
U7100:

Resistance between pins 17/18 = 3.6 ohms

 Resistance between pins 27/28 = 0L

ASD with battery connected says nothing.

title: 820-3115-b charger stops working
message:
"Resistance between pins 27/28 = 0L"
Check R7021/22 and their traces.

title: 820-3115-b charger stops working
message: R7122 had a crack in the solder. Thanks a lot.
